message.body: hey.
Hi
rough day. how's you?
Been a tough week
What's going on with you?

bad headspace. feeling like future is bleak. down.
i wish you were here.
what's up w/ you?
Cleaning like crazy, feeling down about myself, almost finished with the semester though.
what's going on?

I'm puppy sitting for Julia who went to Phoenix to see a concert. Jb just got home from work. I'm having a glass of wine. My house is clean :) yay! My sociology partner is coming over in the morning to study.
How bout you?
putting gear on ebay, just to pay for fuel, food and bills. applied to jobs...waiting. scared - financially. tired. lonely.
can't wait to be there! a lot of work to do. here, and there.
I get being scared and tired. I understand all of that but what does it mean to not be lonely? What does that look like?
good question. i know i used to enjoy life...not so much anymore. part of it is sharing life with someone.
I think it's something you should think about, explore. Sharing your life with someone can look like many things. What is it that you need/want at this time in your life?
Simple...just currently lacking.
Just someone to talk to, spend time with, care about and be cared by. Company. I need company. Companionship.
I'm pressing a bit because I know you have been uncomfortable with the situation that currently exists, being..,I am married and so on.
Hey!
Hi :)
How are you today?
A little better. How're you?
A little better as well. What are you up to?
Storage.
I'm working on homework.
I talked to x, and he said its cool if I come out there early. Probably in two Weeks, and I might stay longer than previously thought.
You still excited about me being there?

I am excited but apprehensive as well. I'm just not sure what you want in regard to us. You must know that I care for you and if you want an intimate relationship well...I'm here waiting. I guess I worry that you won't be able to get past the fact that I
The "married" part of it isn't the issue.
What part is the issue?
We'll work it all out when I'm there.
Ok
Good night, sweet dove.
Hey, how's you? How's your day?
I'm pretty good. Been a restful day. How bout you?
Frustrating Cathy day. Her ADD meds aint workin.
Storage crunchtime.
And.. The unit I'm moving to jumped up in price over 50 bucks!
Lame!
U visited me in my dream last night :) it was nice I see you :)

;-) good morning!
My day is already tense. The guy I gave my guitars to, to sell, is saying that people have been telling him that they're worth far less than what I told him were my minimum prices. And he's mad at me because he thinks I don't know what
That's what I got first thing this morning!
It shouldn't be that hard to confirm value. That's what the Internet is for.

I know.
What it is, is that he lost his faith in ME.
I don't go around bragging and talking myself up, so people that are used to that don't give me the respect I deserve.

Well, I don't either. Your friends should know you and know your character. Maybe he's not as close of a friend as u thought or there is something personal going on in his life that's causing him to act out.

Yeah. Both, me thinks.
I'm tired of it. I operate so differently than the norm... But, i'm so done with the level of disrespect I get from "friends".
U have others in ur life that are disrespectful?
A couple. Thankfully, very few.
Hey. Just saying hello.
